Display [[resource packs]] and [[behavior packs]] data in the chat bar.

== Syntax ==
:<code>/packstack <stackType: stackType> [verbose: verbore] [exclude-vanilla: exclude-vanilla]</code>
::Display resource packs and behavior packs data in the chat bar.

== Arguments ==
* {{cd|stackType: stackType}}: Type of pack. {{cd|client}} is resources pack, {{cd|server}} is behavior pack.
* {{cd|verbose: verbore}}: Show details.
* {{cd|exclude-vanilla: exclude-vanilla}}: Exclude the vanilla package.
